content: here s the tutorial on how to make my crochet babydoll top and dress this is a made to measure pattern so you can adjust it to any size **materials ** 3 mm crochet hook number 2 / sport weight yarn i used 270 grams for the top and 550 grams for the dress stitch markers tape measure scissors needle **timestamps** 00 00 intro 00 57 materials 01 15 top part 06 53 sewing the top part 09 53 bottom part 18 42 measurements 19 13 scalloped edging 23 25 how to mark straps 26 49 straps 33 33 outro
